definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper

sentences.english: To hammer or cut(metal) into thin leaf or foil.
sentences.chinese: 兩條金箔固定在一根細金屬桿上。

sentences.english: They are similar, but one pair has diamanté on it.
sentences.chinese: 眼鏡比較相似，但是其中一副鑲有金箔。

sentences.english: The chocolates are individually wrapped in gold and silver foil.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力分別用金箔紙和銀箔紙包裝。

sentences.english: Better effect by coordinating Magic All in One Eye Gold Foil Basic Solution.
sentences.chinese: 如配合神奇全效眼部金箔原液使用效果更佳。
貼金箔是怎麼貼上去的？

sentences.english: The chocolates are individually wrapped in gold foil.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力用金箔紙一顆顆獨立包裝。

sentences.english: In some places, still can give a LieZuLieZong burning gold foil paper.
sentences.chinese: 有些地方還會給列祖列宗燒金箔紙錢。

sentences.english: Hot gold foil can be used to protect products from being imitation.
sentences.chinese: 燙金箔可用來保護產品不被仿製。

sentences.english: The first to use gold foil is Japan's Kyoto geisha.
sentences.chinese: 最早使用金箔紙的是日本京都的藝妓。

sentences.english: Belinda Khan is buried in the village in a grave decorated with tinsel.
sentences.chinese: 貝琳達安葬在一個金箔裝飾的墳墓。

sentences.english: This beautiful painting can only be seen in the Museo.
sentences.chinese: 原有的金箔畫現多藏於博物館。

sentences.english: Wherever she ent she carried this golden Buddha with her.
sentences.chinese: 她造了一座佛像，貼滿金箔，走到哪裏都帶着它。

sentences.english: The Swallow takes off the gold, leaf by leaf. He takes it to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 小燕子一片片地揭下了金箔，把它送給窮人們。

sentences.english: We bank over a landscape where the wheat fields are sheets of gold leaf.
sentences.chinese: 我們靠岸在一個地形上，在那裏麥田是張張金箔。

sentences.english: The gift was wrapped in gold paper.
sentences.chinese: 這個禮物使用金箔紙包裝的。

sentences.english: Two thin strips of gold are fastened to a narrow metal rod.
sentences.chinese: 兩條金箔固定在一根細金屬桿上。

definition: variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
gold and silver foil/gold and silver leaf

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1
